{{About|the CD set|the album|Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds}}
'''''Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds''''' is an original soundtrack CD set. Gift set with additional physical items was released on January 11, 2023,<ref>Chinese HoYoLAB: [https://www.miyoushe.com/ys/article/33871426 {{zh|璃月篇「皎月云间之梦」OST周边礼盒 即将开启贩售！}}]</ref> and CD set was later released on February 1.<ref>miHoYo Gift Shop: [https://www.mihoyogift.com/goods/2021532940683711921152 {{zh|【原神】「皎月云间之梦」CD 礼盒 Genshin - 原神万有铺子}}]</ref>

This CD set contains the OST album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]'' of three discs "Glazed Moon Over the Tides," "Shimmering Sea of Clouds and Moonlight," and "Battles of Liyue."

A bonus CD ''[[Fleeting Colors in Flight (CD)|Fleeting Colors in Flight]]'' is attached to this CD Set.
